0.name: End of game only
0.description: Scores will not be displayed until the end of the game.

1.name: Real-time
1.description: Each player's score will be updated and displayed throughout the game.

0.name: Off
0.description: The count of resources in the bag will be visible.

1.name: On
1.description: The count of resources in the bag will not be visible.

0.name: Off
0.description: No secret objectives. Points determined by saved/quarantined species and completed keepers only.

1.name: On
1.description: Each player draws one of 8 secrete objectives cards. A 5th main action (replace secret objectives) is added.
